Title: Lahey v. Commonwealth of Pennsylvania
Writer: Peter Nowalk (created by), Morenike Balogun, Sarah L. Thompson, Morenike Balogun (executive story editor), Abby Ajayi (story editor), Sarah L. Thompson (story editor)
Actors: Viola Davis, Billy Brown, Jack Falahee, Aja Naomi King
Plot: A meeting with Olivia Pope proves to be crucial in giving Annalise the opportunity to argue her case in the nation's highest court.
